name: Generic Dungeon Survival Game
description:
We started this Jam a bit late, taking on the challenge about halfway through. This is my first game, and ThePickaxe91's second. This was a super fun learning experience and it was definitely a struggle to get the game ready on time, but I am proud of what we accomplished.

Known issues:
- Final wave does not end before "Win" Screen appears
- Sometimes when clicking directly in the center of the enemy hitbox, the game will crash.
- The game is VERY loud, so please be careful and turn your headphones down.
